Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in variants that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that are immediately followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurrences relative to the total number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' events
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in variants that include a prior 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that result in successful payment (i.e., end with 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' events that occur after exactly one approval step (e.g., directly after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that are part of the three most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' is skipped despite the presence of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that appear in variants also containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' at any point
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in cases with claim amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' to variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' directly follows 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of completed reimbursement processes that include both 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' events that belong to cases eventually leading to payment, among all its occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' appears in process variants without any prior rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' events occurring in 2018 versus 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' events that are not followed by any rejection activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in variants that do not contain any rejection activity
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
